body.name: WV LeisureMaster M12 5G Unlocked Cell Phone,4GB RAM+128GB ROM Dual Sim Cellphone, Android Smartphone 48MP+72MP Dual Camera, 7300mAh Battery 7.3-inch HD+ Screen, Face Recognition
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 4 hrs 18 mins
features: 【Dual 4G VoLTE & global LTE bands】 Our smartphone is compatible with most of the GSM Networks and CDMA Networks. Both SIM card slots are compatible with 4G and support 4G VoLTE in both slots. A 24-Month manufacturer's warranty is promised, If you experience any problem with our products or service please don’t hesitate to contact us right away.

【48/100MP & 7.3 Inch HD Cellphones】 M12 smartphone with 48MP front camera, , 100MP rear camera autofocus, can brings more details to your creativity. Super night mode can help you take amazing photos in any light. Thanks to 7.3 inch big screen with 20:9 aspect ratio and dual speakers design, the M12 Android 11 Cellphone allows you to enjoy the pleasure of movies and games.

【Power To Keep Going】: M12 Smart cellphone is equipped with 7300mAh battery, Standby time will Up to 4-day ,you can watch your favorite show, chat or listen to music on your journey without battery anxiety. 18W fast charging adapter will charge your phone more efficiently.

【128GB Expansion Internal Storage】4GB+ 128GB memory allows you to store all the photos, videos, musics, E-books and files that important to you without storage anxiety. You can insert another 128G memory card(included) to get more storage space. Face recognition and fingerprint reader help you unlock your mobile phone within a second.

【Latest Android 11.0 OS & MTK6737 Quad-core CPU processor】 Equipped with the latest Android 11.0 OS and MTK6737 Quad-core CPU processor, C21s Unlocked Cellphone will drastically improves the running speed, network, ,frame rate and picture smoothness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Reasons for Purchase There are two colors: black and white, you can choose anyone you like

OS Android 11.0 Processor MTK6737 quad-core CPU Storage & RAM 6GB RAM+ 128GB ROM+ 1 Cards Slots Supports storage up to 128GB Display 7.3" HD+ Full Screen ,20:9 aspect ratio ,Resolution: 2520 x 3008 ,Capacitive multi-touch Rear Camera 108MP Primary Camera f/2, 12MP Ultra-wide Camera f/2.2 , FOV 120°, 4MP Macro Camera f/2.4 Rear camera video features 1080p, 720p, 480p video recording. Connectivity Dual SIM dual standby+128GB Cards Slots. Networks 5G network Dual SIM use: Both SIM slots are compatible with 5G, and support in both slots simultaneously. Included in the box Included in the box 1x Phone .1x Screen Protector .1x Phone Case.1x Type-C Cable .1x Power Adapter .1x SIM Tray Ejector .1x Quick Start Guide
7.3 "Max Vision HD + Large Full View Display 7.3 "Max Vision HD+Display, with 90 Hz refresh rate. Making games, movies and video chat faster and smoother on the ultra-wide screen

Screen Fingerprint Unlock Under the screen, it contains advanced technology innovative screen figerprints light touch and flash unlock. You can safely unlock your mobile phone in less than a second, and no longer need to worry about forgetting your mobile phone password
Fast Face Recognition M12 is equiped with Zero-light face recognition, can recognize your faces quickly and accurately, even in dark conditions.

Strong Positioning and Navigation Function Strong positioning and navigation function can help you find airport, high-speed railway stations, shopping centers and other public places on the map faster and more accurately

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money
reviews.reviewText: The battery life is horrible. The camera even worse. The phone lags alot and the refresh rate on the phone is really bad. Volume on phone and speakers really low blue tooth connection are hit or miss. The only thing good about this phone is the appearance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Getting very hot quickly
reviews.reviewText: Getting very hot quickly.Apps slow to run.Battery emptied in only 7 hours, not as advertised, and failed to recharge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but slow
reviews.reviewText: The phone is very sluggish in response, loading and generally everything. The battery drains fromfull charge to dead in less then 30 mins just from waiting. Camera is not as special as described. I am returning it, gave it a few days but a burner phone is more functional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars the screen size. it is NOT 7.3 inch. the one I got is 6.5 inch.
reviews.reviewText: it is not a good battery, won't hold charge for long.,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: La batería se descarga realmente muy rápido y la verdad es el primer producto que me ha decepcionado, entiendo que por el precio no podría esperar mucho pero la verdad es que si pudieran hacer que la batería dure un poco más sería realmente bueno...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't hold charge no cases available
